description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.H3ogllRvvxw3SOMu]{Espionage Specialist}

One moment you might be schmoozing with a rival executive in a private office, and the next moment youâ€™re assassinating them. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.i5giuY838Czbb6Qa]{Fast-Talk}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.YL1fs0mA5Gpb7sdV]{Greater Feint}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.11cfGGiQ9oTi4f9G]{Improved Feint} as a bonus feat. If you already have all these feats, you can select another feat for which you meet the prerequisites as a bonus feat. In addition, whenever you attack and hit someone who is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{flat-footed}, such as during a surprise round, you deal that target an extra 1d8 damage of the same type your weapon normally deals.

modifiers.name: Backstabber (Ex)
modifiers.notes: Whenever you attack and hit someone who is flat-footed, such as during a surprise round, you deal that target an extra 1d8 damage of the same type your weapon normally deals.
